cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Natural Resources on May 26, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 438, a bill to amend the Alyce Spotted Bear and Walter Soboleff Commission on Native Children Act to extend the deadline for a report by the Alyce Spotted Bear and Walter Soboleff Commission on Native Children, and for other purposes

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 12 (Thursday, January 21, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. YOUNG:
H.R. 438.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 3 and
Article I, Section 8, Clause 18
[Page H227]

latestAction.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 76.

title: To amend the Alyce Spotted Bear and Walter Soboleff Commission on Native Children Act to extend the deadline for a report by the Alyce Spotted Bear and Walter Soboleff Commission on Native Children, and for other purposes.
